name: part_006
file: tmp_【#アキロゼ4周年LIVE】全編歌ライブ！みんなと歌って踊って3D LIVE 「ROSE of the LAMP」【アキ・ローゼンタール⧸ホロライブ】 [mknggf96fuI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'ROSE of the LAMP'.
MC section where Aki Rosenthal announces the release of her new song.
Performance of the song 'MOON PRIDE' with guest members.

subtitles.original: だってもっと触れたい
subtitles.english: Because I want to touch you more,

subtitles.original: 知りたい
subtitles.english: I want to know you,

subtitles.original: 隠した想い
subtitles.english: these hidden feelings.

subtitles.original: ときどきラブロマンティック
subtitles.english: Sometimes it's love-romantic.

subtitles.original: ときには甘く触れた 果実のように
subtitles.english: Sometimes touching sweetly, like fruit,

subtitles.original: 君にそっと囁くの
subtitles.english: I'll whisper softly to you.

subtitles.original: 情熱の誘うままに ねえ
subtitles.english: Just as passion leads me, hey,

subtitles.original: 本当の素顔見せて
subtitles.english: show me your true face.

subtitles.original: Wanna be Give me Give me Love, Give me Give me Love 私のすべてを
subtitles.english: Wanna be, Give me Give me Love, Give me Give me Love, all of me.

subtitles.original: だって Crazy Crazy Love, Crazy Crazy Love 本気見せてあげる
subtitles.english: Because it's Crazy Crazy Love, Crazy Crazy Love, I'll show you I'm serious.

subtitles.original: アブラカタブラ アブラカタブラ 君と出会えた奇跡に
subtitles.english: Abracadabra, Abracadabra, to the miracle of meeting you,

subtitles.original: アブラカタブラ アブラカタブラ 愛を込めて踊りましょう
subtitles.english: Abracadabra, Abracadabra, let's dance with all our love.

subtitles.original: 歌って 笑って 悩んで 迷える日々も なんて素敵なドラマティック
subtitles.english: Singing, laughing, worrying, even those days of being lost—how wonderful and dramatic.

subtitles.original: そうやって探って 感じて 重ね合わせて
subtitles.english: Searching, feeling, and layering them together like that,

subtitles.original: 君にちょっと近づくの
subtitles.english: I'll get a little closer to you.

subtitles.original: 鼓動が叫ぶくらい ほら
subtitles.english: So much that my heart screams, look,

subtitles.original: 炎より強く光って
subtitles.english: shining brighter than a flame.

subtitles.original: さぁよ Give me Give me Love, Give me Give me Love 溶かしてあげるわ
subtitles.english: Come on, Give me Give me Love, Give me Give me Love, I'll melt you away.

subtitles.original: きっと Funny Funny Love, Funny Funny Love もう止められないの
subtitles.english: Surely it's Funny Funny Love, Funny Funny Love, it can't be stopped anymore.

subtitles.original: アブラカタブラ アブラカタブラ こんな素晴らしい世界に
subtitles.english: Abracadabra, Abracadabra, in this wonderful world,

subtitles.original: アブラカタブラ アブラカタブラ 君のために踊りましょう
subtitles.english: Abracadabra, Abracadabra, let's dance for you.

subtitles.original: まぁ Give me Give me Love, Give me Give me Love 私のすべてを
subtitles.english: More Give me Give me Love, Give me Give me Love, all of me.

subtitles.original: ベイビー君だけに 君だけに 全部届けたいよ
subtitles.english: Baby, to you alone, to you alone, I want to deliver everything.

subtitles.original: まぁ Give me Give me Love, Give me Give me Love 私のすべてを
subtitles.english: More Give me Give me Love, Give me Give me Love, all of me.

subtitles.original: だって Crazy Crazy Love, Crazy Crazy Love 本気見せてあげる
subtitles.english: Because it's Crazy Crazy Love, Crazy Crazy Love, I'll show you I'm serious.

subtitles.original: アブラカタブラ アブラカタブラ 君と出会えた奇跡に
subtitles.english: Abracadabra, Abracadabra, to the miracle of meeting you,

subtitles.original: アブラカタブラ アブラカタブラ 愛を込めて踊りましょう
subtitles.english: Abracadabra, Abracadabra, let's dance with all our love.

subtitles.original: はい！ということでアキロゼの新曲がきたぞー！
subtitles.english: Yes! So, AkiRose's new song is here!

subtitles.original: 6月2日0時、なので今日の夜中に発売開始、配信開始なので
subtitles.english: It'll be released at midnight on June 2nd, which is tonight, so it'll be available for streaming and purchase,

subtitles.original: ぜひぜひ買ってください！
subtitles.english: so please definitely check it out!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: よし、じゃあまだまだ盛り上がっていくぞ！
subtitles.english: Alright, let's keep the excitement going!

subtitles.original: 続いてはこの曲だ！
subtitles.english: Next up is this song!

subtitles.original: MOON PRIDE あなたの力になりたい
subtitles.english: MOON PRIDE, I want to be your strength.

subtitles.original: 涙は頬を伝い
subtitles.english: Tears stream down the cheeks,

subtitles.original: 瞳は赤く燃える
subtitles.english: eyes burn red.

subtitles.original: 稲妻のように激しく
subtitles.english: Violent like lightning,

subtitles.original: 誰かが愛を叫ぶ
subtitles.english: someone screams of love.

subtitles.original: たとえどんな
subtitles.english: No matter how deep...

subtitles.original: 暗闇 ひとりじゃないよね
subtitles.english: ...the darkness, you're not alone, right?

subtitles.original: 照らす Moonlight
subtitles.english: The moonlight that shines upon us.

subtitles.original: ああ 女の子にも
subtitles.english: Ah, girls too have...

subtitles.original: 譲れぬ矜持がある
subtitles.english: ...a pride they cannot yield.

subtitles.original: それは王子様に運命投げず
subtitles.english: It's the will to fight for themselves,

subtitles.original: 自ら戦う意志
subtitles.english: not leaving their fate to a prince.
